title: Bug 18285: Incorrect Behavior When Doubleclicking on Import Statement
description: When navigating in the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement opens the editor for the referenced type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
OB: In the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement opens the editor for the referenced type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should open for the unit hosting the import reference, not the referenced type.
SR:
1. Open the package view outline.
2. Double-click on a type import statement.
